API_Description: Formats one or more arguments as a string according to a format string. It is similar to the C function of the same name. This method converts and formats incoming arguments into a result string according to a format string ( `cFormat` ).

arguments.description: The optional arguments(s) that contain the data to be inserted in place of the % tags specified in the first parameter, the format string. The number of optional arguments must be the same as the number of % tags.

Returns: A result string formatted as specified.
